custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: unicough
custom_nodes.title: OpenAI Image API with gpt-image-1
custom_nodes.description: This custom node uses OpenAI Image API to generate image (if no input image is provided) or edit image (if input image is provided) with the latest gpt-image-1 model. To use it, you will need to provide your OpenAI API key. This makes the node to be friendly for situations where ComfyUi serves as API server, because you don't have to login like the official OpenAI GPT Image 1 node does.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VideoUpscale_WithModel
custom_nodes.description: A memory-efficient implementation for upscaling videos in ComfyUI using non-diffusion upscaling models. This custom node is designed to handle large video frame sequences without memory bottlenecks.

custom_nodes.author: ryanontheinside
custom_nodes.title: Deep Live Cam for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This node integrates the face-swapping capabilities from Deep Live Cam into ComfyUI, allowing you to perform real-time face swapping on images and video streams.

custom_nodes.author: XieJunchen
custom_nodes.title: comfyUI_LLM
custom_nodes.description: comfyUI_LLM is the integration of a large language model into ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: raykindle
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Step1X-Edit
custom_nodes.description: This custom node integrates the [a/Step1X-Edit](https://github.com/stepfun-ai/Step1X-Edit) image editing model into ComfyUI. Step1X-Edit is a state-of-the-art image editing model that processes a reference image and user's editing instruction to generate a new image.

custom_nodes.author: BetaDoggo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Cloud-APIs
custom_nodes.description: Nodes for using models from online providers. Flux, Auraflow, SoteDiffusion, etc.

custom_nodes.author: Vaporbook
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SaveImage-PP
custom_nodes.description: A better SaveImage than SaveImage-Plus.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Step1X-Edit
custom_nodes.description: Make Step1X-Edit avialbe in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: McKlinton2
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI McKlinton Pack — Mask Node
custom_nodes.description: This custom node for ComfyUI enables detailed segmentation of colored mask images into specific anatomical regions for male and female bodies.

custom_nodes.author: kambara
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PromptCheckList
custom_nodes.description: This is a text editing extension for ComfyUI. It allows you to easily switch phrases for prompts using only the mouse.

custom_nodes.author: MijnSpam
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_UploadToPushOver
custom_nodes.description: Send generated image to PushOver API webhook with optional parameters such as prompt-id and metadata payload.

custom_nodes.author: FaberVS
custom_nodes.title: MultiModel
custom_nodes.description: A collection of nodes and utilities to make working with multiple models, custom parameters, and prompt styles in ComfyUI easier, faster, and more flexible. You are welcome to use and adapt them for your own workflows!

custom_nodes.author: somesomebody
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-lorainfo-sidebar
custom_nodes.description: Preview images of LoRA files and edit their associated JSON files.

custom_nodes.author: mw
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_IndexTTS
custom_nodes.description: IndexTTS Voice Cloning Nodes for ComfyUI. High-quality voice cloning, very fast, supports Chinese and English, and allows custom voice styles.

custom_nodes.author: SirLatore
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-IPAdapterWAN
custom_nodes.description:
This extension adapts the [a/InstantX IP-Adapter for SD3.5-Large](https://huggingface.co/InstantX/SD3.5-Large-IP-Adapter) to work with Wan 2.1 and other UNet-based video/image models in ComfyUI.
Unlike the original SD3 version (which depends on joint_blocks from MMDiT), this version performs sampling-time identity conditioning by dynamically injecting into attention layers — making it compatible with models like Wan 2.1, AnimateDiff, and other non-SD3 pipelines.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DeZoomer-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.description: NODES: Save Image (JPG), Combine Conditionings (Weighted)

custom_nodes.author: ArtsticH
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_EasyKitHT_NodeAlignPro
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI_EasyKitHT_NodeAlignPro is a lightweight ComfyUI node alignment and node coloring tool for refactoring and rewriting the UI based on the open-source projects Comfyui-Align and Comfyui-Nodealigner.

custom_nodes.author: HM-RunningHub
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_RH_Step1XEdit
custom_nodes.description: This is a ComfyUI custom node implementation for image editing using the Step-1 model architecture, specifically adapted for reference-based image editing guided by text prompts.

custom_nodes.author: lisaks
custom_nodes.title: Pixstri ComfyUI Comics
custom_nodes.description: Pixstri is a custom plugin for ComfyUI designed to generate comic pages. It provides a hierarchical node system that allows you to create comic layouts with rows and frames, making it easy to design and preview comic pages within your ComfyUI workflows.

Also pairs well with [a/ComfyUI-Liebs_Picker](https://github.com/marklieberman/ComfyUI-Liebs-Picker) and [a/cg-image-filter](https://github.com/chrisgoringe/cg-image-filter) to be notified when the picker is waiting.

custom_nodes.author: vekitan55
custom_nodes.title: Simple Flux.1 Merger for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node set for merging Flux.1-based models with intuitive control. This extension provides both simplified group merging and expert per-layer control, including support for advanced difference-based merge modes. Basically the code was generated by ChatGPT.

custom_nodes.description: A custom node extension for ComfyUI that allows mixing multiple models during the sampling process for enhanced image generation.

custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-YogurtNodes is a collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI, providing a series of practical image processing and workflow enhancement functionalities.

custom_nodes.author: BNP1111
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_flux_corrector
custom_nodes.description: This model was fine-tuned on Flux.1-Dev to with reflection tuning to serve as a corrector for self-refinement framework introduced in From Reflection to Perfection: Scaling Inference-Time Optimization for Text-to-Image Diffusion Models via Reflection Tuning.

custom_nodes.author: Cryptyox
custom_nodes.title: anaglyphTool-Comfyui
custom_nodes.description: This Comfyui node creates an anaglyph image from a color and depth map input. It achieves high speeds suitable for video to anaglyph conversion by using CUDA GPU acceleration.

custom_nodes.author: hugo
custom_nodes.title: fastgan-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: A FastGAN Node for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: a-und-b
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Mask Area Condition
custom_nodes.description: A simple custom node for ComfyUI that analyzes the size (area) of a mask relative to the total image area. Its primary purpose is to enable conditional workflows, allowing you to run specific processes (like face detailing) only when needed based on the size of the detected object (e.g., a face mask).

custom_nodes.author: marklieberman
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Liebs-Picker
custom_nodes.description: A node to pause execution of the workflow and select which input images should proceed to the output.

custom_nodes.author: SXQBW
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen-Omni
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Qwen-Omni is the first ComfyUI plugin that supports end-to-end multimodal interaction, enabling seamless joint generation and editing of text, images, and audio. Without intermediate steps, with just one operation, the model can simultaneously understand and process multiple input modalities, generating coherent text descriptions and voice outputs, providing an unprecedentedly smooth experience for AI creation.

custom_nodes.author: nobrainX2
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Custom Dia
custom_nodes.description: This is a ComfyUI integration of the [a/Dia TTS model](https://github.com/nari-labs/dia/). Many thanks to nari-labs for their fantastic work.

custom_nodes.author: 1038lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ReduxFineTune
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-ReduxFineTune is a custom node for ComfyUI that enables advanced style fine-tuning using the Flux Redux approach. It offers multiple unified fusion modes for precise and consistent control over style transfer, allowing users to fine-tune image styles with high flexibility and detail.

custom_nodes.author: zygion
custom_nodes.title: i-zygion-util-nodes
custom_nodes.description: NODES: Item List, Template Input, Template Processor, Scene Queue Node, Trigger Passthrough Node

custom_nodes.author: neverbiasu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ChatTTS
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI integration for [a/ChatTTS](https://github.com/2noise/ChatTTS), enabling high-quality, controllable text-to-speech generation directly in your ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.author: hanyingcho
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI LLM Promp
